Package nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts

Class Environment.EnvOperation

java.lang.Object
nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts.Environment.EnvOperation
Enclosing class:
Environment
public static class Environment.EnvOperation extends Object
An instance of this class is used to record a command that an agent sent to the real environment through an instance of Environment. This is so that the Environment can store what was the last command sent for the purpose of instrumentation.

      A unique id identifying whoever invokes this operation. E.g. agentid.actionid.

      A unique id identifying the entity in the real environment to which this operation is targeted.

      The name of the command that this operation represents.

    • expectedTypeOfResult

      public Class expectedTypeOfResult
      If not null, thus specifies the expected type of result of this operation.

    • result

      public Object result
      Used to store the result of the operation, if any. If the field expectedTypeOfResult is not null, then the runtime type of result is expected to match (equal of a subclass of) the type specified by expectedTypeOfResult.
